frame.name: Influencing_potential
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Force</fen> has the potential to influence an <fen>Entity</fen> or <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> within a certain <fen>Domain</fen> due to some <fen>Source</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Force">Economic <t>power</t></fex> gives <fex name="Entity">China</fex> <fex name="Domain">enormous political pull.</fex></ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Force
FE.definition:
<def-root>Something which has the capability of affecting a <fen>Entity</fen> in some way.
<ex>The <t>power</t> <fex name="Force">of love</fex> can do great things.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Entity
FE.definition:
<def-root>Something which is dependent on the influencing <fen>Force</fen>.
<ex>Final quarter reports have great <t>influence</t> <fex name="Entity">on stock prices</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Domain
FE.definition: <def-root>A description of the areas in which the <fen>Force</fen> can affect the <fen>Entity</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Source
FE.definition: <def-root>A principle factor which gives the <fen>Force</fen> the capability to affect the <fen>Entity</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: State_of_affairs
FE.definition: <def-root>A situation which can be influenced or brought about by the <fen>Force</fen>.</def-root>
